GetConnectivityInfo.description: Grants permission to retrieve the connectivity information for a Greengrass core device

UpdateConnectivityInfo.description: Grants permission to update the connectivity information for a Greengrass core. Any devices that belong to the group that has this core will receive this information in order to find the location of the core and connect to it

GetGroupCertificateAuthority.description: Grants permission to return the public key of the CA associated with a group

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by checking tag key/value pairs associated with a specific resource

GetDeploymentStatus.description: Grants permission to return the status of a deployment

ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by checking tag key/value pairs included in the request

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by checking tag keys passed in the request

GetDeployment.description: Grants permission to get a deployment

CancelDeployment.description: Grants permission to cancel a deployment

DeleteDeployment.description: Grants permission to delete a deployment. To delete an active deployment, it needs to be cancelled first

TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by checking tag key/value pairs included in the request

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by checking tag keys passed in the request

UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by checking tag key/value pairs included in the request

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by checking tag keys passed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by checking tag key/value pairs associated with a specific resource

GetBulkDeploymentStatus.description: Grants permission to return the status of a bulk deployment

ListBulkDeploymentDetailedReports.description: Grants permission to retrieve a paginated list of the deployments that have been started in a bulk deployment operation and their current deployment status

StopBulkDeployment.description: Grants permission to stop the execution of a bulk deployment

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by checking tag key/value pairs associated with a specific resource

ListGroupCertificateAuthorities.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of current CAs for a group

ListGroupVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a group

GetAssociatedRole.description: Grants permission to retrieve the role associated with a group

GetDeploymentStatus.description: Grants permission to return the status of a deployment

GetGroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a group

GetGroupCertificateAuthority.description: Grants permission to return the public key of the CA associated with a group

GetGroupCertificateConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current configuration for the CA used by a group

GetGroupVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a group version

AssociateRoleToGroup.description: Grants permission to associate a role with a group. The role's permissions must allow Greengrass core Lambda functions and connectors to perform actions in other AWS services

CreateGroupCertificateAuthority.description: Grants permission to create a CA for the group, or rotate the existing CA

CreateGroupVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of a group that has already been defined

DeleteGroup.description: Grants permission to delete a group that is not currently in use in a deployment

DisassociateRoleFromGroup.description: Grants permission to disassociate the role from a group

ResetDeployments.description: Grants permission to reset a group's deployments

UpdateGroup.description: Grants permission to update a group

UpdateGroupCertificateConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the certificate expiry time for a group

GetGroupVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a group version

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by checking tag key/value pairs associated with a specific resource

ListCoreDefinitionVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a core definition

GetCoreDefinition.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a core definition

GetCoreDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a core definition version

CreateCoreDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing core definition. Greengrass groups must each contain exactly one Greengrass core

DeleteCoreDefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a core definition. Deleting a definition that is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments

UpdateCoreDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a core definition

GetCoreDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a core definition version

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by checking tag key/value pairs associated with a specific resource

ListDeviceDefinitionVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a device definition

GetDeviceDefinition.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a device definition

GetDeviceDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a device definition version

CreateDeviceDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing device definition

DeleteDeviceDefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a device definition. Deleting a definition that is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments

UpdateDeviceDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a device definition

GetDeviceDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a device definition version

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by checking tag key/value pairs associated with a specific resource

ListFunctionDefinitionVersions.description: Grants permission to list the versions of a Lambda function definition

GetFunctionDefinition.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a Lambda function definition, such as its creation time and latest version

GetFunctionDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a Lambda function definition version, such as which Lambda functions are included in the version and their configurations

CreateFunctionDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to create a version of an existing Lambda function definition

DeleteFunctionDefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a Lambda function definition. Deleting a definition that is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments

UpdateFunctionDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a Lambda function definition

GetFunctionDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a Lambda function definition version, such as which Lambda functions are included in the version and their configurations

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by checking tag key/value pairs associated with a specific resource

DeleteSubscriptionDefinition.description: Grants permission to delete a subscription definition. Deleting a definition that is currently in use in a deployment affects future deployments

UpdateSubscriptionDefinition.description: Grants permission to update a subscription definition

GetSubscriptionDefinitionVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a subscription definition version

GetResourceDefinition.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a resource definition, such as its creation time and latest version

Discover.description: Grants permission to retrieve information required to connect to a Greengrass core

GetThingRuntimeConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve runtime configuration of a thing

UpdateThingRuntimeConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update runtime configuration of a thing

GetComponent.description: Grants permission to get the recipe for a version of a component

GetComponentVersionArtifact.description: Grants permission to get the pre-signed URL to download a public component artifact

ListClientDevicesAssociatedWithCoreDevic.description: Grants permission to retrieve a paginated list of client devices associated to a AWS IoT Greengrass core device

ListEffectiveDeployments.description: Grants permission to retrieves a paginated list of deployment jobs that AWS IoT Greengrass sends to AWS IoT Greengrass core devices

ListInstalledComponents.description: Grants permission to retrieve a paginated list of the components that a AWS IoT Greengrass core device runs

GetCoreDevice.description: Grants permission to retrieves metadata for a AWS IoT Greengrass core device

BatchAssociateClientDeviceWithCoreDevice.description: Grants permission to associate a list of client devices with a core device

BatchDisassociateClientDeviceFromCoreDev.description: Grants permission to disassociate a list of client devices from a core device

DeleteCoreDevice.description: Grants permission to delete a AWS IoT Greengrass core device, which is an AWS IoT thing. This operation removes the core device from the list of core devices. This operation doesn't delete the AWS IoT thing
